meta.title: Features - Mataresit
meta.description: Discover all the powerful features that make Mataresit the best receipt management solution for your business.

hero.title: Powerful Features for Modern Businesses
hero.subtitle: Everything you need to transform your receipt management and streamline your financial workflows.

aiProcessing.title: AI Vision Processing
aiProcessing.description: Advanced AI vision technology directly analyzes receipt images with 99% accuracy, confidence scoring, and real-time feedback.

smartSearch.title: Semantic Search & AI Discovery
smartSearch.description: Powerful semantic search with natural language queries across receipts, claims, and business directory.

malaysianIntelligence.title: Malaysian Business Intelligence
malaysianIntelligence.description: Specialized recognition for 500+ Malaysian businesses with local tax system support (GST/SST).

advancedAnalytics.title: Advanced Analytics Dashboard
advancedAnalytics.description: Comprehensive team analytics with expense tracking, trends analysis, and exportable insights.

batchProcessing.title: Batch Processing
batchProcessing.description: Upload and process multiple receipts simultaneously with tier-based limits and real-time progress tracking.

realTimeNotifications.title: Real-Time Notifications
realTimeNotifications.description: Stay informed with instant push notifications for receipt processing, team activities, and claim updates.

progressiveWebApp.title: Progressive Web App
progressiveWebApp.description: App-like experience with offline capabilities, push notifications, and responsive design.

customCategories.title: Custom Categories
customCategories.description: Organize receipts with your own custom categories and tags.

teamCollaboration.title: Enhanced Team Management
teamCollaboration.description: Advanced team collaboration with bulk operations, audit trails, and comprehensive member management.

claimsManagement.title: Advanced Claims System
claimsManagement.description: Complete expense claims management with receipt integration, approval workflows, and priority levels.

exportOptions.title: Advanced Export & Reporting
exportOptions.description: Comprehensive export system with multiple formats, analytics export, and filter-aware reporting.

subscriptionManagement.title: Subscription Management
subscriptionManagement.description: Complete billing system with Stripe integration, auto-renewal, and multi-language support.

secureStorage.title: Secure Storage
secureStorage.description: Bank-level security ensures your financial data is always protected.

mobileResponsive.title: Mobile Responsive Design
mobileResponsive.description: Fully responsive web application optimized for mobile devices with touch-friendly interfaces.

helpCenter.title: Comprehensive Help Center
helpCenter.description: Complete support system with FAQ, search functionality, and categorized help topics.

apiAccess.title: Full API Access
apiAccess.description: Complete REST API access with authentication, rate limiting, and comprehensive documentation for Max tier users.

cta.title: Ready to experience these features?
cta.subtitle: Start your free trial today and see how Mataresit can transform your business.
